data.title: About: Bye, See You Monday
data.meta_description: Bye, See You Monday (French: Au revoir... à lundi) is a 1979 French-Canadian drama film directed by Maurice Dugowson. It was entered into the 12th Moscow International Film Festival.
data.text:
dbo:Work/runtime

104.0

dbo:abstract

Bye, See You Monday (French: Au revoir... à lundi) is a 1979 French-Canadian drama film directed by Maurice Dugowson. It was entered into the 12th Moscow International Film Festival. (en)

Au revoir, à lundi ou Au revoir... à lundi, est un film franco-canadien de Maurice Dugowson réalisé en 1978 et sorti en 1979 tiré d'un récit de Roger Fournier. (fr)
